attributes.action: Free the younger generation by isolating just those most vulnerable to Covid 19
attributes.additional_details:
The current strategy is not economically sustainable if herd immunity is not delivered by a vaccine next year. 
The younger generation's liberty and prospects should not be sacrificed for what is primarily the prevention of premature deaths.
Everyone should be responsible for their own safety - Hands, Face, Space and isolate where necessary.
Those not capable of being responsible are already cared for by someone.
attributes.background: Change the overall Covid 19 to guidance that pensioners and people with specific health conditions isolate i.e. those most at risk. Put in place measures specifically aimed at protecting and supporting this group.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552023
